description: This is a test suite for SQLite storage functionality in a backend API, including CRUD operations and filtering tests for agent and workflow sessions.

methods.name: temp_db_path
methods.description: Fixture that creates a temporary database file and cleans it up after tests.

methods.name: agent_storage
methods.description: Fixture that initializes a SqliteStorage instance for agent sessions.

methods.name: workflow_storage
methods.description: Fixture that initializes a SqliteStorage instance for workflow sessions.

methods.name: test_agent_storage_crud
methods.description: Tests CRUD operations for agent session storage including create, read, update, delete, and drop.

methods.name: test_workflow_storage_crud
methods.description: Tests CRUD operations for workflow session storage including create, read, update, delete, and drop.

methods.name: test_storage_filtering
methods.description: Tests filtering of agent sessions based on user_id and entity_id.

methods.name: test_workflow_storage_filtering
methods.description: Tests filtering of workflow sessions based on user_id and entity_id.
